headline: Presto Chango! A Dazzling Trick to Pay Down College Debt
abstract: Under the Secure Act, approved in December, up to $10,000 can be used to repay student loans. The law also allows 529 funds to be used for apprenticeships.
lead_paragraph: Tax-favored savings accounts known as 529 plans can help families save and invest to pay for college. But until now, the funds could not be used to repay student debt.
